explains: adj. 可怕的；恶梦似的；不愉快的

sentences.en: The party began to take on an unreal, almost nightmarish quality.
sentences.cn: 聚会开始呈现出虚幻、近乎梦魇般的气氛。

sentences.en: She described a nightmarish scene of dead bodies lying in the streets.
sentences.cn: 她描述了街头遍地横尸的恶梦般场景。

sentences.en: When the nightmarish upheaval finally ended they had to rebuild their lives from scratch.
sentences.cn: 当噩梦般的日子最终结束，他们还不得不从伤痛中重塑他们的生活。
